arg.name: arg 1
arg.jname: ボタン名 (日本語、省略可)

arg.name: arg 1
arg.jname: ボタン名 (日本語、省略可)

arg.name: arg 1
arg.jname: ボタン名 (日本語、省略可)

arg.name: arg 1
arg.jname: ボタン名 (日本語、省略可)

arg.name: arg 1
arg.jname: ボタン名 (日本語、省略可)

arg.name: arg 1
arg.jname: ボタン名 (日本語、省略可)

arg.name: arg 1
arg.jname: ボタン名 (日本語、省略可)

params.sqlcmd: "select " +" T_SALES.\\"SLIP_CD\\" as \\"SLIP_CD\\", " +" T_SALES.\\"CUST_CD\\" as \\"CUST_CD\\", " +" M_CUST.\\"CUST_NAME\\" as \\"CUST_NAME\\", " +" to_char(T_SALES.\\"INSPC_ACPT_TYP\\") as \\"INSPC_ACPT_TYP\\", " +" T_SALES.\\"CUST_ODR_NO\\" as \\"CUST_ODR_NO\\", " +" to_char(T_SALES.\\"SALES_DATE\\", 'YYYY/MM/DD') as \\"SALES_DATE\\", " +" to_char(T_SHIP.\\"SHIP_DATE\\", 'YYYY/MM/DD') as \\"SHIP_DATE\\", " +" T_SALES.\\"SALES_DEPT_CD\\" as \\"SALES_DEPT_CD\\", " +" M_ORG.\\"ORG_NAME\\" as \\"ORG_NAME\\", " +" T_SALES.\\"CUST_CHRG_PSN_CD\\" as \\"CUST_CHRG_PSN_CD\\", " +" USER_MST.\\"USER_NAME\\" as \\"USER_NAME\\", " +" T_SALES.\\"ITEM_CD\\" as \\"ITEM_CD\\", " +" T_SALES.\\"ITEM_NAME\\" as \\"ITEM_NAME\\", " +" T_SHIP.\\"CUST_ITEM_CD\\" as \\"CUST_ITEM_CD\\", " +" to_char(T_SALES.\\"SALES_QTY\\") as \\"SALES_QTY\\", " +" to_char(T_SHIP.\\"SHIP_QTY\\") as \\"SHIP_QTY\\", " +" to_char(T_SALES.\\"SALES_UNIT_PRICE\\") as \\"SALES_UNIT_PRICE\\", " +" to_char(T_SALES.\\"SALES_AMOUNT\\") as \\"SALES_AMOUNT\\", " +" M_CUR.\\"CUR_UNIT\\" as \\"CUR_UNIT\\", " +" T_SALES.\\"REMARKS\\" as \\"REMARKS\\", " +" to_char(T_SALES.\\"STATUS\\") as \\"STATUS\\", " +" to_char(T_SALES.\\"MODIFY_COUNT\\") as \\"MODIFY_COUNT\\", " +" T_SALES.\\"AI_AR_IF_FLG\\" as \\"AI_AR_IF_FLG\\", " +" M_ITEM.\\"STOCK_UNIT\\" as \\"PKG_UNIT\\", " +" T_ODR.\\"ODR_NO\\" as \\"ODR_NO\\", " +" TO_CHAR(T_SHIP.\\"PART_DLV_SEQ_NO\\") as \\"PART_DLV_SEQ_NO\\", " +" TO_CHAR(T_ODR.\\"DESINATED_DLV_DATE\\", 'YYYY/MM/DD') as \\"DESINATED_DLV_DATE\\", " +" TO_CHAR(T_ODR.\\"ODR_ACPT_DATE\\", 'YYYY/MM/DD') as \\"ODR_ACPT_DATE\\", " +" TO_CHAR(T_ODR.\\"ODR_QTY\\") as \\"ODR_QTY\\", " +" T_SHIP_ODR.\\"SHIP_ODR_NO\\" as \\"SHIP_ODR_NO\\", " +" M_ITEM.\\"UNIT_QTY_TYP\\" as \\"UNIT_QTY_TYP\\", " +" M_ITEM_SPEC.CUST_ITEM_NAME " +"from " +" T_SALES, " +" T_SHIP, " +" M_CUST, " +" M_CUR, " +" M_ORG, " +" USER_MST, " +" SYS_MY_COMPANY, " +" M_ITEM, " +" T_ODR, " +" T_SHIP_ODR, " +" M_ITEM_SPEC " +"where " +" T_SALES.CUST_CD = M_CUST.CUST_CD(+) " +" and SYS_MY_COMPANY.COMPANY_CD = M_CUST.COMPANY_CD " +" and T_SALES.SALES_DEPT_CD = M_ORG.ORG_CD(+) " +" and SYS_MY_COMPANY.COMPANY_CD = M_ORG.COMPANY_CD " +" and T_SALES.CUST_CHRG_PSN_CD = USER_MST.USER_CD(+) " +" and T_SALES.CURRNCY_CD = M_CUR.CUR_CD(+) " +" and T_SALES.\\"SLIP_CD\\" = T_SHIP.\\"SLIP_CD\\"(+) " +" and T_SALES.ITEM_CD = M_ITEM.ITEM_CD " +" and T_SALES.SLIP_CD = T_SHIP_ODR.SLIP_CD " +" and T_SHIP_ODR.ODR_NO = T_ODR.ODR_NO " +" and SYS_MY_COMPANY.CTRL_CD = 'SYSTEM' " +" and T_SALES.\\"DEL_FLG\\" = 0 " +" and T_SHIP.\\"DEL_FLG\\"(+) = 0 " +" and T_SALES.\\"SLIP_CD\\" = ? " +" and M_ITEM_SPEC.COMPANY_CD = SYS_MY_COMPANY.COMPANY_CD " +" and M_ITEM_SPEC.CUST_CD = T_SALES.CUST_CD " +" and M_ITEM_SPEC.CUST_ITEM_CD = T_SHIP.CUST_ITEM_CD"
"select " +" SYS_INSTALL_OPTIONS.\\"OPTION_ID\\" as \\"OPTION_ID\\" " +"from " +" SYS_INSTALL_OPTIONS " +"where " +" SYS_INSTALL_OPTIONS.\\"OPTION_ID\\" like 'B%'"
"select " +" to_char(T_AR_LEDGER_H_TRN.\\"STATUS\\") as \\"STATUS\\" " +"from " +" T_AR_LEDGER_H_TRN " +"where " +" T_AR_LEDGER_H_TRN.\\"SLIP_CD\\" = ? " +" and T_AR_LEDGER_H_TRN.\\"SLIP_TYP\\" = 14"
"select " +" to_char(T_AR_LEDGER_H.\\"STATUS\\") as \\"STATUS\\" " +"from " +" T_AR_LEDGER_H " +"where " +" T_AR_LEDGER_H.\\"SLIP_CD\\" = ? " +" and T_AR_LEDGER_H.\\"SLIP_TYP\\" = 14"

"select " +" M_CUST.\\"COMPANY_CD\\" as \\"COMPANY_CD\\", " +" M_CUST.\\"CUST_CD\\" as \\"CUST_CD\\", " +" M_CUST.\\"CUST_NAME\\" as \\"CUST_NAME\\", " +" M_CUST.\\"CUR_CD\\" as \\"CUR_CD\\", " +" to_char(M_CUST.\\"EXCH_TYP\\") as \\"EXCH_TYP\\", " +" to_char(M_CUST.\\"INSPC_ACPT_TYP\\") as \\"INSPC_ACPT_TYP\\", " +" M_CUST.\\"TAX_CD\\" as \\"TAX_CD\\", " +" to_char(M_CUST.\\"DETAIL_ROUND_TYP\\") as \\"DETAIL_ROUND_TYP\\", " +" M_CUST.\\"TAX_APPLY_TYP\\" as \\"TAX_APPLY_TYP\\" " +"from " +" M_CUST, " +" SYS_MY_COMPANY " +"where " +" M_CUST.COMPANY_CD = SYS_MY_COMPANY.COMPANY_CD " +" and SYS_MY_COMPANY.CTRL_CD = 'SYSTEM' " +" and M_CUST.\\"CUST_CD\\" = ?"

"select " +" M_ORG.\\"ORG_CD\\" as \\"ORG_CD\\", " +" M_ORG.\\"ORG_NAME\\" as \\"ORG_NAME\\" " +"from " +" M_ORG, " +" SYS_MY_COMPANY " +"where " +" M_ORG.\\"COMPANY_CD\\" = SYS_MY_COMPANY.COMPANY_CD " +" and SYS_MY_COMPANY.CTRL_CD = 'SYSTEM' " +" and M_ORG.\\"ORG_CD\\" = ?"
"select " +" USER_MST.\\"USER_CD\\" as \\"USER_CD\\", " +" USER_MST.\\"USER_NAME\\" as \\"USER_NAME\\" " +"from " +" USER_MST " +"where " +" USER_MST.\\"USER_CD\\" = ?"

"select " +" M_CUR.\\"CUR_CD\\" as \\"CUR_CD\\", " +" M_CUR.\\"CUR_UNIT\\" as \\"CUR_UNIT\\", " +" to_char(M_CUR.\\"DECIMAL_FIG\\") as \\"DECIMAL_FIG\\", " +" M_CUST.\\"DETAIL_ROUND_TYP\\" as \\"DETAIL_ROUND_TYP\\" " +"from " +" M_CUR, " +" M_CUST, " +" SYS_MY_COMPANY " +"where " +" M_CUR.CUR_CD = M_CUST.CUR_CD " +" and M_CUST.COMPANY_CD = SYS_MY_COMPANY.COMPANY_CD " +" and SYS_MY_COMPANY.\\"CTRL_CD\\" = 'SYSTEM' " +" and M_CUST.\\"CUST_CD\\" = ?"

"select " +" M_ITEM.\\"ITEM_CD\\" as \\"ITEM_CD\\", " +" M_ITEM.\\"ITEM_NAME\\" as \\"ITEM_NAME\\", " +" M_ITEM.\\"STOCK_UNIT\\" as \\"STOCK_UNIT\\" " +"from " +" M_ITEM " +"where " +" M_ITEM.\\"ITEM_CD\\" = ?"
"select " +" to_char(T_SALES.\\"MODIFY_COUNT\\") as \\"MODIFY_COUNT\\" " +"from " +" T_SALES " +"where " +" T_SALES.\\"DEL_FLG\\" = 0 " +" and T_SALES.\\"SLIP_CD\\" = ? " +"for update nowait"
"call SQLURILINK(?, ?, ?, ?, ?)"

"select " +" to_char(M_TAX.OLD_TAX_RATE_1) as TAX_RATE_1, " +" to_char(M_TAX.OLD_TAX_RATE_2) as TAX_RATE_2, " +" to_char(M_TAX.OLD_TAX_RATE_3) as TAX_RATE_3, " +" to_char(M_TAX.ROUND_TYP) as TAX_ROUND_TYP " +"from " +" M_TAX " +"where " +" M_TAX.TAX_CD = ? " +" and M_TAX.NEW_TAX_RATE_START_DATE > to_date(?, 'YYYY/MM/DD') " +"union all " +"select " +" to_char(M_TAX.NEW_TAX_RATE_1) as TAX_RATE_1, " +" to_char(M_TAX.NEW_TAX_RATE_2) as TAX_RATE_2, " +" to_char(M_TAX.NEW_TAX_RATE_3) as TAX_RATE_3, " +" to_char(M_TAX.ROUND_TYP) as TAX_ROUND_TYP " +"from " +" M_TAX " +"where " +" M_TAX.TAX_CD = ? " +" and M_TAX.NEW_TAX_RATE_START_DATE <= to_date(?, 'YYYY/MM/DD')"

"select " +" SYS_HOME_CUR.\\"HOME_CUR_CD\\" as \\"HOME_CUR_CD\\", " +" M_CUR.\\"CUR_UNIT\\" as \\"CUR_UNIT\\", " +" to_char(M_CUR.\\"DECIMAL_FIG\\") as \\"DECIMAL_FIG\\" " +"from " +" SYS_HOME_CUR, " +" M_CUR " +"where " +" SYS_HOME_CUR.\\"HOME_CUR_CD\\" = M_CUR.\\"CUR_CD\\" " +" and SYS_HOME_CUR.\\"CTRL_CD\\" = 'SYSTEM'"

"UPDATE " +" T_SALES " +"SET " +" \\"ITEM_NAME\\" = ?, " +" \\"SALES_DATE\\" = ?, " +" \\"SALES_DEPT_CD\\" = ?, " +" \\"CUST_CHRG_PSN_CD\\" = ?, " +" \\"SALES_QTY\\" = ?, " +" \\"SALES_UNIT_PRICE\\" = ?, " +" \\"SALES_AMOUNT\\" = ?, " +" \\"SALES_AMOUNT_EXCH_RATES\\" = ?, " +" \\"INSPC_ACPT_DATE\\" = ?, " +" \\"INSPC_ACPT_QTY\\" = ?, " +" \\"EXTERNAL_TAX_SALES_AMOUNT\\" = ?, " +" \\"INTERNAL_TAX_SALES_AMOUNT\\" = ?, " +" \\"TAXFREE_SALES_AMOUNT\\" = ?, " +" \\"TAX_CREDIT_SALES_AMOUNT\\" = ?, " +" \\"EXTERNAL_TAX_AMOUNT\\" = ?, " +" \\"INTERNAL_TAX_AMOUNT\\" = ?, " +" \\"TAX_AMOUNT_1\\" = ?, " +" \\"TAX_AMOUNT_2\\" = ?, " +" \\"TAX_AMOUNT_3\\" = ?, " +" \\"OWN_CUR_TAXCREDIT_SALES_AMOUNT\\" = ?, " +" \\"REMARKS\\" = ?, " +" \\"STATUS\\" = ?, " +" \\"APPR_FLG\\" = ?, " +" \\"APPR_ID\\" = ?, " +" \\"APPR_DATE\\" = to_date(?), " +" \\"EXCH_RATE\\" = to_number(?) " +"WHERE " +" T_SALES.\\"SLIP_CD\\" = ? " +" AND T_SALES.\\"DEL_FLG\\" = 0"

"update " +" T_SALES " +"set " +" \\"STATUS\\" = ?, " +" \\"APPR_FLG\\" = ?, " +" \\"APPR_ID\\" = ?, " +" \\"APPR_DATE\\" = to_date(?) " +"where " +" T_SALES.\\"SLIP_CD\\" = ? " +" and T_SALES.\\"DEL_FLG\\" = 0"

"update " +" T_SALES " +"set " +" \\"SLIP_CD\\" = ?, " +" \\"ORG_SLIP_CD\\" = ?, " +" \\"STATUS\\" = ?, " +" \\"APPR_FLG\\" = ?, " +" \\"APPR_ID\\" = ?, " +" \\"APPR_DATE\\" = to_date(?) " +"where " +" T_SALES.\\"SLIP_CD\\" = ? " +" and T_SALES.\\"DEL_FLG\\" = 0"
"update " +" T_SHIP " +"set " +" \\"SLIP_CD\\" = ? " +"where " +" T_SHIP.\\"SLIP_CD\\" = ? " +" and T_SHIP.\\"DEL_FLG\\" = 0"

"select " +" T_AR_LEDGER_H_TRN.\\"SLIP_CD\\" as \\"SLIP_CD\\" " +"from " +" T_AR_LEDGER_H_TRN, " +" SYS_MY_COMPANY, " +" SYS_AR_CTRL " +"where " +" T_AR_LEDGER_H_TRN.\\"COMPANY_CD\\" = SYS_MY_COMPANY.\\"COMPANY_CD\\" " +" and T_AR_LEDGER_H_TRN.\\"SLIP_TYP\\" = 14 " +" and T_AR_LEDGER_H_TRN.\\"SLIP_CTRL_GRP\\" = SYS_AR_CTRL.\\"SLIP_CTRL_GRP\\" " +" and T_AR_LEDGER_H_TRN.\\"SLIP_CD\\" = ? " +" and T_AR_LEDGER_H_TRN.\\"SALES_MODIFICATION_FLG\\" = 0 " +" and T_AR_LEDGER_H_TRN.\\"INSPC_ACPT_CRCT_TYP\\" = 2 " +" and T_AR_LEDGER_H_TRN.\\"STATUS\\" < 40 " +" and SYS_MY_COMPANY.\\"CTRL_CD\\" = 'SYSTEM' " +" and SYS_AR_CTRL.\\"COMPANY_CD\\" = SYS_MY_COMPANY.\\"COMPANY_CD\\""

"select " +" T_AR_LEDGER_H.\\"SLIP_CD\\" as \\"SLIP_CD\\" " +"from " +" T_AR_LEDGER_H, " +" SYS_MY_COMPANY, " +" SYS_AR_CTRL " +"where " +" T_AR_LEDGER_H.\\"COMPANY_CD\\" = SYS_MY_COMPANY.\\"COMPANY_CD\\" " +" and T_AR_LEDGER_H.\\"SLIP_TYP\\" = 14 " +" and T_AR_LEDGER_H.\\"SLIP_CTRL_GRP\\" = SYS_AR_CTRL.\\"SLIP_CTRL_GRP\\" " +" and T_AR_LEDGER_H.\\"SLIP_CD\\" = ? " +" and T_AR_LEDGER_H.\\"SALES_MODIFICATION_FLG\\" = 0 " +" and T_AR_LEDGER_H.\\"STATUS\\" < 40 " +" and T_AR_LEDGER_H.\\"CRCT_FLG\\" = 0 " +" and SYS_MY_COMPANY.\\"CTRL_CD\\" = 'SYSTEM' " +" and SYS_AR_CTRL.\\"COMPANY_CD\\" = SYS_MY_COMPANY.\\"COMPANY_CD\\""
"update " +" T_SHIP_ODR " +"set " +" \\"SLIP_CD\\" = ?, " +" \\"ORG_SLIP_CD\\" = ? " +"where " +" T_SHIP_ODR.\\"SLIP_CD\\" = ? " +" and T_SHIP_ODR.\\"DEL_FLG\\" = 0"

"select " +" M_ITEM_SPEC.\\"TAX_CD\\" as \\"TAX_CD\\" " +"from " +" M_ITEM_SPEC, " +" SYS_MY_COMPANY " +"where " +" M_ITEM_SPEC.\\"COMPANY_CD\\" = SYS_MY_COMPANY.\\"COMPANY_CD\\" " +" and M_ITEM_SPEC.\\"CUST_CD\\" = ? " +" and M_ITEM_SPEC.\\"CUST_ITEM_CD\\" = ?"

"select " +" TO_CHAR(M_UNIT_COST.\\"UNIT_COST\\") as \\"UNIT_COST\\" " +"from " +" M_UNIT_COST, " +" SYS_MY_COMPANY " +"where " +" SYS_MY_COMPANY.COMPANY_CD = M_UNIT_COST.COMPANY_CD " +" and SYS_MY_COMPANY.CTRL_CD = 'SYSTEM' " +" and M_UNIT_COST.\\"CUST_CD\\" = ? " +" and M_UNIT_COST.\\"ITEM_CD\\" = ? " +" and M_UNIT_COST.\\"EFF_PHASE_IN_DATE\\" <= TO_DATE(?, 'YYYY/MM/DD') " +"order by " +" M_UNIT_COST.\\"EFF_PHASE_IN_DATE\\" desc"
"select " +" TO_CHAR(SYS_DATE_CTRL.\\"BUSINESS_OPR_DATE\\", 'YYYY/MM/DD') as \\"BUSINESS_OPR_DATE\\" " +"from " +" SYS_DATE_CTRL " +"where " +" SYS_DATE_CTRL.\\"PLANT_CD\\" = ?"
"select " +" SYS_CLASS_CODE.\\"CODE\\" " +"from " +" SYS_CLASS_CODE " +"where " +" SYS_CLASS_CODE.\\"SYS_CLASS\\" = 'SALES' " +" and SYS_CLASS_CODE.\\"CLASS_CODE\\" = 'PLANT_WEB'"
"SELECT " +" SYS_INSTALL_OPTIONS.\\"INSTALL_FLG\\" AS \\"INSTALL_FLG\\" " +"FROM " +" SYS_INSTALL_OPTIONS " +"WHERE " +" SYS_INSTALL_OPTIONS.\\"OPTION_ID\\" = 'AiR'"
"SELECT " +" T_ODR.\\"TAX_CD\\" AS \\"TAX_CD\\" " +"FROM " +" T_ODR " +"WHERE " +" T_ODR.\\"ODR_NO\\" = ?"

"SELECT " +" TO_CHAR(EXCH_RATE) AS EXCH_RATE " +"FROM " +" M_EXCH_RATE " +"WHERE " +" COMPANY_CD = ? " +" AND CUR_CD = ? " +" AND EXCH_TYP = ? " +" AND EXCH_START_DATE = ( " +" SELECT " +" MAX(EXCH_START_DATE) " +" FROM " +" M_EXCH_RATE " +" WHERE " +" COMPANY_CD = ? " +" AND CUR_CD = ? " +" AND EXCH_TYP = ? " +" AND EXCH_START_DATE <= TO_DATE(?) " +" )"
